name: topological
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the way the parts of something are organized or connected: The model uses six basic topological relationships. Computer-aided design makes extensive use of topological concepts. The mirror image of the pattern gives a different topologic arrangement.
More examplesFewer examplesThe results of the survey give us a topological understanding of the environment.We can characterize the structure of these descriptions in terms of topological properties.A topological diagram shows the relative position of objects, but is not to scale.
